Title: Spring enters town for all families
Designer: Shanghai People's Fine Arts Publishing House Propaganda Poster Group (上海人民美术出版社宣传画组)
Publisher: Shanghai renmin meishu chubanshe (上海人民美术出版社)
Notes: The imprint of this poster states "本社宣传画组集体创作" - Collective creation of the company's propaganda poster group.The poster consists of two sheets.
